dict.acceptation: 更远的，较远的；更进一步的，深一层的；更多的；

sent.orig: Further is now more common than farther in British English.
sent.trans: 在英式英语中，现在further比farther用得更普遍。
（那种事）我决不干〔further 是 in hell 的委婉话〕。

sent.orig: Try moving your palms further and further apart slowly.
sent.trans: 试着慢慢地分开两手越来越远。

sent.orig: People go further and further away to reach open air and countryside which recedes from them.
sent.trans: 人们越走越远，以期趋近旷野和农村，但是旷野和农村却渐渐远去了。

sent.orig: If further details are required, we shall be pleased if you would write us further.
sent.trans: 如果需要进一步的细节，请来信，我们乐于提供。
